TEXT.TITLE: TEXAS AIR <TEX> UNIT TO ADD MEXICO FLIGHTS
TEXT.BODY: Texas Air Corp's Continental Airlines unit said it will begin service to Mexico from Atlanta in May. Continental said it will add non-stop flights to Mexico City, Puerto Vallarta, Cancun, Acapulco and Ixtapa. Reuter
